name: n8n-nodes-base.pipedrive
semantic_context: Create and edit data in Pipedrive

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get data of many products

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

subject.name: subject
subject.description: The subject of the activity to create
subject.ai_hint: The subject of the activity to create

done.name: done
done.description: Whether the activity is done or not
done.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

type.name: type
type.description: Type of the activity like "call", "meeting", etc
type.ai_hint: Type of the activity like "call", "meeting", etc

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: done
options.description: Whether the Activity is done or not. 0 = Not done, 1 = Done. If omitted returns both Done and Not done activities.

options.name: end_date
options.description: Use the Activity due date where you wish to stop fetching Activities from. Insert due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

options.name: filterId
options.description: The ID of the Filter to use (will narrow down results if used together with user_id parameter). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: start_date
options.description: Use the Activity due date where you wish to begin fetching Activities from. Insert due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

options.name: type
options.description: Type of the Activity. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: user_id
options.description: The ID of the User whose Activities will be fetched. If omitted, the User associated with the API token will be used. If 0, Activities for all company Users will be fetched based on the permission sets. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

activityId.name: activityId
activityId.description: ID of the activity to update
activityId.ai_hint: ID of the activity to update

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: customProperties
options.description: Adds a custom property to set also values which have not been predefined

values.name: name
values.description: Name of the custom field to set. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: value
values.description: Value of the property to set

options.name: email
options.description: Email of the person

options.name: label
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: marketing_status
options.description: Please be aware that it is only allowed once to change the marketing status from an old status to a new one

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the person

options.name: org_id
options.description: ID of the organization this deal will be associated with. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: phone
options.description: Phone number of the person

options.name: owner_id
options.description: ID of the User this person will be associated with. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: visible_to
options.description: Visibility of the deal. If omitted, visibility will be set to the default visibility setting of this item type for the authorized user.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

title.name: title
title.description: Name of the lead to create
title.ai_hint: Name of the lead to create

associateWith.name: associateWith
associateWith.description: Type of entity to link to this lead
associateWith.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

org_id.name: org_id
org_id.description: ID of the organization this deal will be associated with
org_id.ai_hint: ID of the organization this deal will be associated with

person_id.name: person_id
person_id.description: ID of the person to link to this lead
person_id.ai_hint: ID of the person to link to this lead

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.description: The ID of the deal whose activity to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
dealId.ai_hint: The ID of the deal whose activity to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

productId.name: productId
productId.description: The ID of the product to add to a deal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
productId.ai_hint: The ID of the product to add to a deal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

item_price.name: item_price
item_price.description: Price at which to add or update this product in a deal
item_price.ai_hint: Price at which to add or update this product in a deal

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: How many items of this product to add/update in a deal
quantity.ai_hint: How many items of this product to add/update in a deal

productAttachmentId.name: productAttachmentId
productAttachmentId.description: ID of the deal-product (the ID of the product attached to the deal). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
productAttachmentId.ai_hint: ID of the deal-product (the ID of the product attached to the deal). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

term.name: term
term.description: The search term to look for. Minimum 2 characters (or 1 if using exact_match).
term.ai_hint: The search term to look for. Minimum 2 characters (or 1 if using exact_match).

exactMatch.name: exactMatch
exactMatch.description: Whether only full exact matches against the given term are returned. It is not case sensitive.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.description: ID of the file to update
fileId.ai_hint: ID of the file to update

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.description: ID of the organization to link to this lead
organization_id.ai_hint: ID of the organization to link to this lead

leadId.name: leadId
leadId.description: ID of the lead to update
leadId.ai_hint: ID of the lead to update

content.name: content
content.description: The content of the note to create
content.ai_hint: The content of the note to create

noteId.name: noteId
noteId.description: ID of the note to update
noteId.ai_hint: ID of the note to update

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the person to create
name.ai_hint: The name of the person to create

organizationId.name: organizationId
organizationId.description: The ID of the organization to create
organizationId.ai_hint: The ID of the organization to create

personId.name: personId
personId.description: ID of the person to update
personId.ai_hint: ID of the person to update

resolveProperties.name: resolveProperties
resolveProperties.description: By default do custom properties get returned only as ID instead of their actual name. Also option fields contain only the ID instead of their actual value. If this option gets set they get automatically resolved.

encodeProperties.name: encodeProperties
encodeProperties.description: By default do custom properties have to be set as ID instead of their actual name. Also option fields have to be set as ID instead of their actual value. If this option gets set they get automatically encoded.

filters.name: filters

options.name: filter_id
options.description: Predefined filter to apply to the deals to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: stage_id
options.description: ID of the stage to filter deals by. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: status
options.description: Status to filter deals by. Defaults to all_not_deleted

options.name: user_id
options.description: ID of the user to filter deals by. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'dealActivity' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'lead' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'product' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'done'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'activityId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'activityId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'activityId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'associateWith'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'deal' AND associateWith == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'org_id'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'deal' AND associateWith == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'person_id'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF /associateWith == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'org_id'
IF /associateWith == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'person_id'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF operation == 'duplicate' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'productId'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'item_price'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'quantity'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'productAttachmentId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'remove' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF operation == 'remove' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'productAttachmentId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'dealProduct' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'term'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'exactMatch'
IF operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'search' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'associateWith'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' AND associateWith == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'organization_id'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' AND associateWith == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'person_id'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF /associateWith == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'organization_id'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'leadId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'leadId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'leadId'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'noteId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'noteId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'noteId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'term'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'personId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'personId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'personId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource IN ["activity", "deal", "organization", "person", "product"] AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'resolveProperties'
IF resource IN ["activity", "deal", "organization", "person", "product"] AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'encodeProperties'
IF operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'dealActivity' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'dealActivity' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'term'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["create", "getAll"] AND resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
